author: Francisco-Gamino
body:
- [ ] Resolves issue

Native Image Generation for PowerShell libraries #1211

To generate ngen binaries for PowerShell, do the following:
ipmo .\build.psm1 -Force
Start-PSBuild -Publish -RemoveILs -CrossGen 

This outputs:
publish: Published to C:\Users\frangom\Documents\GitHub\PowerShell\src\powershell-win-core\bin\Debug\netcoreapp1.0\win10-x64\publish
Published 1/1 projects successfully
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.Security.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreCLR.AssemblyLoadContext.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreCLR.Eventing.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.ConsoleHost.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets.ni.dll ...
Generating assembly System.Management.Automation.ni.dll ...
PowerShell.exe with ngen binaries is available at C:\Users\frangom\Documents\GitHub\PowerShell/src/powershell-win-core\bin\Debug\netcoreapp1.0\win10-x64\publish\powershell.exe

After this, start PowerShell.exe from the following location: C:\Users\frangom\Documents\GitHub\PowerShell/src/powershell-win-core\bin\Debug\netcoreapp1.0\win10-x64\publish\powershell.exe
- [ ] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
  Yes
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
  No tests needed for this code change
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Please, update appveyor.yml (and later .travis.yml) to call CrossGen.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Update AppVeyor.yml and travis.sh to use this funcitonality
:clock1:

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @Francisco-Gamino  I still don't see changes in appveyor.yml and travis.yml.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
On OSX there is a problem (because of dotnet package).
They don't publish crossgen for runtime `osx.10.11-x64`, they only do `osx.10.10-x64`.
We need to relax corssgen-find logic for osx.

title: Enable crossgen for PowerShell binaries on Windows and Linux
